document_data.name: Wands
document_data.symbol: A black sleeve below three gold stars against a field of purple
document_data.mainbody: '''Wands''' ({{Pronounce|WANDS|refs=}}) was a distinguished [[Waterdhavian]] noble house that had a strong history of magic within the city.
document_data.Base of Operations: The family owned [[Wands Villa|a villa]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]], at the corner of [[Shando Street]] and the [[Magecourt]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Eldrus Wands]]
* [[Ellidis Wands]]
* [[Hyacia Wands]]
* [[Jehan Wands]]
* [[Marcus Wands]]
* [[Maskar Wands]]
* [[Nharaen Wands]] ([[1479 DR]])
* [[Olanhar Wands]]
* [[Scirkhel Wands]]
* [[Syndra Wands]]
* [[Tertius Wands]]
* [[Torlyn Wands]] ([[1479 DR]])
* [[Hamiklar Wands]] (deceased)
document_data.History: In [[1370 DR]], the Wands family suffered a public embarrassment when Marcus Wands stole the family heirloom of [[Mulhorand]]i origins, the ''[[golden scarab beetle]]'', that was said to bring magic luck to any Wands family member possessing it. The ''scarab'' was lost in [[Undermountain]] and Maskar Wands, the family [[wizard]] patriarch, requested [[Khelben Arunsun]]'s aid in the matter. The heirloom was subsequently retrieved from the [[Tomb of Ankh-Kephra]] and returned to the Wands family.
